author: Allen Fang
description: Reminiscent of an aged rum-based Espresso Martini (and yes it works when made with espresso coffee rather than cold brew). Fernet Branca and falernum add depth of flavour and their own distinctive personality. A great after dinner drink. The salt influence is subtler than the name might suggest.
name: Out to Sea
recipeIngredient: 3 Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
